facts.text: I'm named after the Greek hero Achilles because of my bold appearance!
I have a bright orange teardrop near my tail that stands out against my dark body!
I love to surf in the waves! I'm found where the water crashes against the reef.
My tail spine is razor sharp and outlined in bright orange as a warning!
I'm one of the most beautiful tangs but also one of the most difficult to keep healthy!

profile.habitat: Surge zones in Pacific coral reefs
